name: Ultimate Legends
description: The island of Legenia is being attacked. Can you defend it? This world needs new heroes. Will you be its Ultimate Legends? Let's find out...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Better Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
